# The Stone Furnace has produced 8 Copper Plates, but there are still 6 Copper Ore left to smelt. 

# I still have 8 coal remaining, which is sufficient to continue the smelting process. 

# To maximize the output, I will insert the remaining 6 Copper Ore into the furnace and fuel it with 2 coal.

insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=2)  # Insert 2 coal into the Stone Furnace
insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, furnace, quantity=6)  # Insert the remaining 6 Copper Ore into the Stone Furnace

# I'll wait for the smelting process to complete and check the outputs periodically.
for _ in range(20):  # Wait for a maximum of 10 seconds (checking every 0.5 seconds)
    sleep(0.5)  # Wait for the smelting process 
    furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)
    if furnace_inventory.get(Prototype.CopperPlate, 0) >= 10:  # Check if we have produced enough Copper Plates
        break

# Check the status of the furnace and overall inventory.
print(f"Furnace inventory after waiting: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Check furnace output
print(f"Inventory after copper smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check overall inventory after smelting
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check entities on the map again
